message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $18,000. It's a fantastic opportunity to get a great deal on a product worth $12,000 to you. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm looking to get at least $18,000 for it. Let me know if you're interested!
Alice, your offer is a bit too high for my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $12,000. Let me know if you're willing to work with me on that.

Bob, I understand that $12,000 is your maximum budget, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $16,000 for the product. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial price.
